entry.title: Raging Bull Bubble Gum
entry.summary:
Vendor: Exclusive Candy
Type: Chocolate
Price: 1.99

A Raging Bull needs Bubble Gum

This isn't just any bubble gum. Raging Bull Bubble Gum is what you've been craving. 

This gum will rev you up. Looking for a pick-me-up? Pop a piece of Raging Bull Bubble Gum in your mouth and chew. It'll help power you through the day.

Forget about being a kid in a candy store. You'll be a bull in a candy store, so you need to stock up.

entry.title: Razzles Berry Mix Candy - 1.6 oz.
entry.summary:
Vendor: Concord Confections
Type: Candy
Price: 1.99

First, it's candy. Then it's gum.

"First it's a candy, then it's gum." Now Razzles Berry Mix is all that but with the extra turn of being candy-coated with the delicious berry flavours of strawberry, blueberry and raspberry. You will be berry happy.

First its a candy,
then its a gum.
If you're indecisive 
this is the one!
You'll be delighted,
amazed and so
dazzled,
when your mouth 
meets the taste
of these magnificent
Razzles!
  • Resealable Bag
  • Kosher Certified Parve
  • Gluten-Free
  • Peanut Free/Nut Free

1.6 oz. Pack 

Ingredients:

Sugar, gum base, dextrose, calcium stearate, natural and artificial flavours, citric acid, gum arabic, tapioca dextrin, artificial colours (FD&C red 40 lake, blue 1 lake), carnauba wax, BHT (to maintain freshness).

Soy may be present.

Ingredients and nutritional information provided by the manufacturer and considered accurate at the time of posting. Refer to product labelling or contact the manufacturer directly for current data.

entry.title: Big League Bubble Gum Baseball
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ford Gum & Machine Company
Type: Candy
Price: 2.99

Retro Bubble Gum Since the 1980s

The Big League Chew Bubble Gum Baseball is definitely a home run! Taste the Big Leagues with this baseball-shaped container of fresh bubble gum gumballs. Take to your next baseball game and share with family and friends or add as a party favour for a themed celebration. Each baseball includes 3 gumballs, a tattoo and a sticker.

  • Includes tattoos and stickers

History of Big League Chew Gum

Big League Chew was invented by Rob Nelson, a pitcher for the Portland Mavericks. He wanted a healthy alternative to chewing tobacco. Believe it or not, Rob says the idea came to him in less than 60 seconds! He was in the bullpen while he came up with this idea. Big League Chew Wild Pitch Watermelon has been around for over thirty years, the novelty never seems to wear off. Big League Chew Wild Pitch Watermelon is a shredded texture of soft, sugary bubble gum goodness! Eat it by the hand fulls, stuff your cheeks, you won't have to spit this out!

Big League Chew-A Poem

Shredded in your pouch.
Thought of in a bullpen
So smooth in my mouth.
Chomped on by the big leagues,
The baseball fans too.
Instead of that tobacco,
Give this gum a chew!
-

Airheads Candy Sugar-Free Chewing Gum

Full of tangy and fruity taste, the Airheads Gum-Paradise Blend Raspberry Lemonade is soft, chewy and filled to the max with extreme Airheads flavour! The secret to this exceptional chewing gum is the tiny micro-candies that are inside every tasty piece. Now you can really savour that fantastic Airhead candy flavour!

entry.title: Nerds Filled Gumballs - 46 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Oak Leaf
Type: Candy
Price: 1.59

Nerds Gumball 5 Ball Tube

These Nerds Gumballs will mystify you! Gumballs filled with Nerds Candy! Upon tasting this gum, you will quickly forget this question. You will be too busy chewing and enjoying its intense fruity flavour! Grape, lemon, orange and lime flavoured gumballs, completely jam-packed with Nerds Candy! How does Willy Wonka do it? These Nerds Gumballs are incredible! Nerds Filled Gumballs come 5 gumballs to a tube and are fruity flavoured.
  • Made in Canada
  • Gluten-Free

46 g Pack 

Ingredients:

Sugar, Dextrose, Corn Syrup, Gum Base, Natural And Artificial Flavours, Malic Acid, Glazing Agent (Resinous Glaze), Glycerine, Thickener (Tapioca Dextrin), Glazing Agent (Carnauba Wax), Antioxidant (E321), Colours (Including E120, E102, E110, E127, E129, E133, E132).

entry.title: Airheads Gum White Mystery - 1.18 oz.
entry.summary:
Vendor: Perfetti Van Melle Inc.
Type: Candy District
Price: 219.00

Airheads Candy Sugar-Free Chewing Gum

What flavour will you get? It's a question you should ponder and find the answer to while chewing the Airheads Gum White Mystery! We can't describe the flavours to you, as they really are a sweet mystery. But we can tell you about the chewing gum itself. Soft and chewy consistency, with tiny pieces of micro -candies that are inside every stick of gum.  Airheads Gum White Mystery is as mouthwatering and tasty and as the Airheads Candy. Tangy, flavourful and absolutely luscious! Find out what all the fuss is about, and discover the mysterious deliciousness of Airheads Gum White Mystery!
1.185 oz. Pack

Sweetest Selection of the Freshest Candy Shipped Fast!

entry.title: Charms What A Melon Blow Pops
entry.summary:
Vendor: Charms
Type: Candy
Price: 0.49

Charms What A Melon Blow Pop Lollipops

Yummy Suckers with Bubble Gum Center

Your lips really will exclaim "what a melon" as you taste this extraordinary lollipop!  

Charms What A Melon Blow Pops are filled with an intensely delicious Watermelon flavour and even come complete with a fantastic bubble gum center!
While eating the What A Melon Sucker you may be taken away to a warm Summertime day when the living is easy and the candy is so sweetly refreshing!
This retro lollipop does have the potential to turn you into a melonhead! But don't worry, just make sure you share the Charms What A Melon Blow Pops with your friends! 
  • Retro Candy Since 1969
  • Peanut Free
  • Gluten-Free
  • Made in the USA

1 Pop

entry.summary:
Vendor: Charms
Type: Candy
Price: 0.49

Charms Cherry Ice Blow Pop Lollipops

Yummy Suckers with a Bubble Gum Center

You'll really be chill' in with this retro lollipop! The Charms Cherry Ice Blow Pop is covered with a cool and icy white exterior before you get to that succulent, red cherry flavoured taste! 
But that's not all, Charms Cherry Ice Blow Pops even comes complete with a bubble gum middle! Two treats in one!
This sucker is sure to deliver an intensified fresh cherry flavour, and the best part is, there are no cherry pits to deal with, just a sweet wad of gum!
Be icy cool but sweet with the Charms Cherry Ice Blow Pops!

entry.title: Charms Blue Razz Berry Blow Pop
entry.summary:
Vendor: Charms
Type: Candy
Price: 0.49

Charms Blue Razz Berry Blow Pop Lollipops

Yummy Suckers with Bubble Gum Center

These Charms Lollipops are so cool, that the word "Raspberry" just can't be used! The word is Razz, as in Charms Blue Razz Berry Blow Pops! 
These retro candy lollipops are delightfully bursting with all the sweet and refreshing taste of Razz-Berries. Yes, ultimately cool and delicious!
Not only are these blue Suckers a tasty treat,  but tucked right in the center of these blue bad boys awaits for you a yummy piece of bubblegum! Two treats in one, as if we really had to sweeten the deal!
Be like the cool kids and experience the irresistible taste of the Charms Blue Razz Berry Blow Pops! 
Stock up with this box of 48 yummy pops!

  • Peanut Free
